revision.text: === Hatchery Helpers Stats === <tabs> <tab name="Maximum Stats"> {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Name !! Cost to Reach Max Stats !! Max Step Efficiency !! Max Attack Efficiency |- | Sam [[File:HHSam.png|20px]] || 125,000,000 {{pdollar}} || 60% || 60% |- | Blake [[File:HHBlake.png|20px]] || 1,250,000,000 {{pdollar}} || 60% || 70% |- | Jasmine [[File:HHJasmine.png|20px]] || 6,250,000,000 {{pdollar}} || 65% || 100% |- | Parker [[File:HHParker.png|20px]] || 125,000,000 {{dungeontokens}} || 65% || 75% |- | Dakota [[File:HHDakota.png|20px]] || 1,250,000,000 {{dungeontokens}} || 100% || 100% |- | Cameron [[File:HHCameron.png|20px]] || 9,375,000 {{farmpoints}} || 125% || 125% |- | Justice [[File:HHJustice.png|20px]] || 1,250,000 {{questpoints}} || 150% || 100% |- | Carey [[File:HHCarey.png|20px]] || 2,500,000 {{questpoints}} || 100% || 175% |- | Aiden [[File:HHAiden.png|20px]] || 625,000 {{diamonds}} || 150% || 150% |- | Kris [[File:HHKris.png|20px]] || 1,250,000 {{diamonds}} || 200% || 150% |- | Noel [[File:HHNoel.png|20px]] || 3,125,000 {{battlepoints}} || 150% || 250% |} </tab> <tab name="+25% Stats"> '''*Note:''' Hatchery Helpers need 31,250 hatches to reach +25% efficiency. This is necessary to complete the [[Achievements#Hatchery|When are you going to breed yourself?]] Achievement. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Name !! Cost to Reach +25% Stats !! +25% Step Efficiency !! +25% Attack Efficiency |- | Sam [[File:HHSam.png|20px]] || 31,250,000 {{pdollar}} || 35% || 35% |- | Blake [[File:HHBlake.png|20px]] || 312,500,000 {{pdollar}} || 35% || 45% |- | Jasmine [[File:HHJasmine.png|20px]] || 1,562,500,000 {{pdollar}} || 40% || 75% |- | Parker [[File:HHParker.png|20px]] || 31,250,000 {{dungeontokens}} || 40% || 50% |- | Dakota [[File:HHDakota.png|20px]] || 312,500,000 {{dungeontokens}} || 75% || 75% |- | Cameron [[File:HHCameron.png|20px]] || 2,343,750 {{farmpoints}} || 100% || 100% |- | Justice [[File:HHJustice.png|20px]] || 312,500 {{questpoints}} || 125% || 75% |- | Carey [[File:HHCarey.png|20px]] || 625,000 {{questpoints}} || 75% || 150% |- | Aiden [[File:HHAiden.png|20px]] || 156,250 {{diamonds}} || 125% || 125% |- | Kris [[File:HHKris.png|20px]] || 312,500 {{diamonds}} || 175% || 125% |- | Noel [[File:HHNoel.png|20px]] || 781,250 {{battlepoints}} || 125% || 225% |} </tab> </tabs>
